name: Sand Island
text: [§6E-36]  Sand Island.  The island on the southwest side of Honolulu Harbor, Oahu, 21 degrees 18 minutes 30 seconds north, 157 degrees 53 minutes 00 seconds west, city and county of Honolulu, proclaimed Anuenue (also known as Rainbow Island) by memorandum 1969-4 of the governor shall be named Sand Island.  The name Sand Island shall be used on all official state maps, documents, and correspondence. [L 1976, c 104, pt of §2]
